name: gramanalyzer
description: Instagram Analytics App - See who doesn't follow you back, who unfollowed you, and more

scripts.build:android: cd web && npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../api && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.android:open: cd web && npx cap open android
scripts.android:sync: cd web && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: cd web && npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
